  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:natecaji/pic1321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic1321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kristusovo trnje (Euphorbia milii)</string>
            <string language="en">Christ Plant (Euphorbia milii)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ Betrieb (Euphorbiengummi milii)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usine du Christ (milii d'euphorbe)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta de Christ (milii do euphorbia)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianta del Christ (milii dell'euforbia)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις Χριστού (milii ευφορβίας)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planta de Cristo (milii del euforbio)</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ljudje so rožo poimenovali Kristosovo trnje zato, ker ima dolge močne bodoice, ki spominjajo na trpljenje Jezusa Kristusa.</string>
            <string language="en">People named this flower Christ Plant because of their big and strong thorns which remind us about suffering of Jesus Christ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kristusovo trnje</string>
            <string language="en">christ plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sobna rastlina</string>
            <string language="en">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jezus kristus</string>
            <string language="en">jesus christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute benannt diesen Blume Christ Betrieb wegen 
ihrer grossen und starken Dornen, die uns über Suffering von Jesus 
Christ erinnern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gens nommés cette usine du Christ de fleur 
en raison de leurs grandes et fortes épines qui nous rappellent au 
sujet de la douleur de Jésus le Christ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Povos nomeados esta planta de Christ da flor por 
causa de seus espinhos grandes e fortes que nos lembram sobre o 
sofrimento de Jesus Christ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente chiamata questa pianta del Christ del 
fiore a causa delle loro spine grandi e forti che ci ricordano circa 
suffering di Jesus Christ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι άνθρωποι ονόμασαν αυτές τις εγκαταστάσεις Χριστού 
λουλουδιών λόγω των μεγάλων και ισχυρών αγκαθιών τους που 
υπενθυμίζουν σε μας για το βάσανο του Ιησού Χριστού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gente nombrada esta planta de Cristo de la flor 
debido a sus espinas grandes y fuertes que nos recuerdan sobre el 
sufrimiento de Jesús Cristo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ Betrieb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jesus Christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usine du Christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jésus le Christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta de christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jesus christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianta del christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">jesus christ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκαταστάσεις Χριστού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιησούς Χριστός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">planta de Cristo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">houseplant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jesús Cristo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
